original_title: PNB Holdings receives three NBE awards and NCE Gold award
original_body_lines: PNB, a leading business process outsourcing (BPO) company serving clients in Australia, UK, USA, and NZ, has once again proven its excellence by securing three coveted awards at the National Business Excellence Awards 2023. Additionally, PNB has been honored with the gold award at the National Exports Awards 2022, showcasing its outstanding achievements in the global market. At the National Business Excellence Awards 2023, held on 20 July , PNB clinched the winner-small category excellence in business and financial results, recognising its exceptional performance and financial growth. In addition, PNB was announced as the runner-up in the other services/other sector category, highlighting its versatility and ability to deliver top-notch solutions across diverse industries. The company also secured the runner-up position in the small category, solidifying its position as a formidable player in the BPO sector.

PNB CEO Priyantha Herath, expressed his gratitude and stated, “We are immensely proud to receive these prestigious awards, which reaffirm our unwavering commitment to excellence in everything we do. Our success is a result of the relentless dedication and hard work of our exceptional team.

As PNB continues to grow and expand its global footprint, these awards serve as a testament to the company’s commitment to providing top-tier BPO services and its relentless pursuit of excellence. Visit www.pnbholdings.com today to discover how our award-winning business process outsourcing services can transform your organisation.”
